full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSTAN PA'I BDAG PO SH'AKYA'I RGYAL PO'I MDZAD PA BCU GNYIS KYI TSUL BSTAN TSUL CUNG BSHAD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES BSTAN PA'I BDAG PO SH'AKYA'I RGYAL PO'I MDZAD PA BCU GNYIS KYI TSUL BSTAN TSUL CUNG BSHAD PA 'DI NI, PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I MDZAD BCU'I BSTOD PAR GZHI BYAS, ,MDO RGYA CHER ROL BA SOGS GZHAN NAS KYANG BLOS GANG DPOGS KYIS CUNG ZAD KHA BSKANGS TE, GSAR BU BA RNAMS LA PHAN KYANG SRID SNYAM PA'I BSAM PA BZANG POS, ,SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA 'JAM DPAL MING CAN GYIS 'PHRAL DU SUG BRIS SU BYAS SO, ,DGE'O, ,)
